title: [Large-scale] PBL-Based Software Modeling Competency Enhancement Program

context.prior_knowledge: Object-Oriented Programming, Basic UML Concepts, and Understanding of the Software Development Life Cycle
context.additional_context: Environment enabling real-time collaboration and self-directed learning using digital devices

learning_goals: Enhance UML diagramming skills by solving real-world software modeling problems in industrial settings using a PBL (Problem-Based Learning) approach
Analyze complex system design problems and derive optimal modeling solutions through group-based collaboration
Complete design documents compliant with modeling standards (OMG, ISO, etc.) using a Student-Directed Learning (SDL) system
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
